Hello my name is Merlin and this is the first time that I have used this forum and therefore my first thread. I thought it best to state specifically what I want to happen in the Middle East. After this I will take each point seperatly in different threads and show why it needs to occur to help the peace process.
 
 1) An end to all violence against Israel and acceptance of Israel's right to exist in the the Middle East.emoticon_xkill 
 
 2) Return of Chebba Farms to Lebanon by Israel. The removal of all Israeli mines, troops and weaponary should also occur from this area.emoticon_xhoho 
 
 3) Return of the Gollan Heights to Syria by Israel. The removal of all Israeli mines, troops and weaponary should also occur from this area. Also any Israeli settlements should be removed as well.:xbanghead 
 
 4)
 a - The formation of a Palestinian State that is whole with no seperate parts.:) (At present the West Bank and Gaza Strip (aprox 4,000,000 people) are seperated by land and should be unified to form the state of Palestine next to Israel).
 b - Right of return of all Palestinian refugees to the new state of Palestine.emoticon_angry 
 c - Removal of all Israeli Settlements, troops, mines, etc from both the Gaza Strip, West Bank and any additional territory in newly formed state of Palestine.emoticon_xdonno 
 
 5) An amnesty to all prisoners on all sides and there release.:xcensored
 
 Thanks Merlin
 
 Will post threads over next couple of days.emoticon_xgood emoticon_love
